original_text: Hath he smitten him, as he smote those that smote him? or is he slain according to the slaughter of them that are slain by him?
korean_text: 주께서 그 백성을 치셨던들 그 백성을 친 자들을 치심과 같았겠으며 백성이 죽임을 당하였던들 백성을 죽인 자가 죽임을 당함과 같았겠느냐

sentences.original_text: as he smote those that smote him?
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그를 친 자들을 친 것처럼?

sentences.original_text: according to the slaughter of them
